column1: Check with your health care provider about when to stop using crutches.
You will need to avoid some sports, such as downhill skiing or contact sports like football and soccer.
Keep your dressing (bandage) on your wound clean and dry.
Follow these steps when you change your dressing: - Wash your hands well with soap and water.
- Soak some clean gauze with saline and wipe from one end of the incision to the other.
- Dry the incision the same way with clean, dry gauze.
